The options for taking the meal are:
Homemade meals at locals - some of our neighbours offers traditional meals at their place - check this option while making a booking.
Each room has a kitchen - great for breakfast or dinner. There is also a barbecue in the garden and 2 grocery stores near by (~2min).

images.text: A glass of 'țuica', before dinner at locals, with a group from Germany.
Our recommendation is to eat at the locals who offers homemade meals.
Each room has a small kitchen with fridge, microwave owen, kettle, dishes, cutlery, tea and coffee.

heading.text: Rosia Montana has a golden past. How the gold mining worked through galleries, watter mills, pounds and open pits, the past of the patrimony buildings from the historic center or the impact of the mega mining project proposed here by the canadian company and the massive streets protests against it are just a few reasons why we recommend to visit Roșia Montana with a guide. The locality is not really designed for tourism so it will be pretty difficult to see and find all this by your own. We stay in touch with local guides who offers guided tours by foot or by bike (also technical assistance on the road). So, if you are interested in:
